mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(b_id, b_title, b_content, b_category, b_view, u_id, b_del, b_date) VALUES(board_num.NEXTVAL, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_category}, #{b_view}, #{u_id}, #{b_del}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set b_category=#{b_category},b_title = #{b_title}, b_content =#{b_content} where b_id = #{b_id}
mapper.delete: update board set b_del='Y' where b_id = #{b_id}
mapper.update: update board set b_view=b_view+1 where b_id=#{b_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT b.*, COUNT(c.COMM_ID) AS reply_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN comments c ON b.B_ID = c.B_ID AND c.COMM_DEL = 'N' WHERE 1=1
AND b.B_CATEGORY = #{bCategory}
AND b.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY b.B_ID, b.B_TITLE, b.B_CONTENT, b.B_CATEGORY, b.B_VIEW, b.U_ID, b.B_DEL, b.B_DATE ORDER BY b.B_ID DESC OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * #{perPageNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{perPageNum} ROWS ONLY
